translation.zh: 但一年之后

translation.en: I think he gained 15.2 kilos.
translation.zh: 我想他的体重增加了15.2公斤

translation.en: When you're in Arnold's company,
translation.zh: 当你和阿诺在一起时

translation.en: you get the impression that everything is easy
translation.zh: 你会觉得一切都轻松容易

translation.en: and there are no problems.
translation.zh: 没有任何问题

translation.en: My father often came along,
translation.zh: 我父亲经常会来

translation.en: and he recognized Arnold's potential.
translation.zh: 他看出了阿诺的潜力

translation.en: [Arnold in English] Freddy Gerstl, the father, became kind of like a real big supporter.
translation.zh: 他父亲弗雷迪·格斯特尔 成为了真正给予我莫大支持的人

translation.en: He said, "You have to have not only just the strong muscles,
translation.zh: 他说：“你不仅要拥有强健的肌肉

translation.en: like you guys are doing, but also you have to have a strong mind."
translation.zh: 他说：“你不仅要拥有强健的肌肉 还得拥有强大的内心”

translation.en: The body doesn't operate by itself. It operates because you give it direction.
translation.zh: 身体是不会自己动的 给身体指示 身体才会动

translation.en: He says, "Remember one thing."
translation.zh: 他说：“记住一点

translation.en: "That you can get an injury, and then all the athletic stuff is over.
translation.zh: 你可能会因为 一次受伤就断送运动生涯

translation.en: "You can have millions of dollars."
translation.zh: 你可能会拥有数百万美元

translation.en: "Someone can rob you blind, and it's gone."
translation.zh: 有人可能会将你洗劫一空

translation.en: "But the only thing no one can take is your mind."
translation.zh: 唯一没人能抢走的 就是你的内心

translation.en: "Your brain power."
translation.zh: 你大脑的力量

translation.en: "Your mind, your will,
translation.zh: 你的思维 你的意志

translation.en: is, in the end, much more important than the body."
translation.zh: 最终会是比身体重要得多的东西

translation.en: He was the father figure quite the opposite from my father.
translation.zh: 他是跟我父亲截然不同的那种父亲

translation.en: Unlike my father, who criticized everything,
translation.zh: 不像我父亲对一切都持批评态度

translation.en: that guy was more the understanding father
translation.zh: 他是更善解人意的父亲

translation.en: that understood and he kind of smoothly would you in the right direction,
translation.zh: 他能理解你 并平缓地将你引上正途

translation.en: rather than forcing you.
translation.zh: 而不是强迫你

translation.en: I always hear this voice behind me saying,
translation.zh: 我总会听到他的声音在我后面说：

translation.en: "Be hungry for information."
translation.zh: “对信息保持渴求”

translation.en: [Arnold] I joined the weight lifting club called Athletik Union Graz.
translation.zh: 我加入了 “格拉茨运动联盟”举重俱乐部

translation.en: The guys from the lake also were training there.
translation.zh: 湖边的那些人也在那里训练

translation.en: So I could train, finally, with the big boys.
translation.zh: 所以我终于能跟大人物们一起训练了

translation.en: That's where Kurt Marnul was training.
translation.zh: 那里也是库尔特·马努尔训练的地方

translation.en: This weightlifting club became, for me, the mecca.
translation.zh: 这个举重俱乐部变成了我的圣地

translation.en: I became addicted to that,
translation.zh: 我沉溺其中

translation.en: and so I went every day.
translation.zh: 每天都会过去

translation.en: When I walked into the gym, there was this wall
translation.zh: 我走进健身中心时 那里有一面墙

translation.en: that was wood.
translation.zh: 是木质的

translation.en: And then I would just take a chalk
translation.zh: 我会拿起一支粉笔

translation.en: and I would write down
translation.zh: 然后写下

translation.en: bizeps,
translation.zh: 二头肌

translation.en: trizeps,
translation.zh: 三头肌

translation.en: brust, rücken.
translation.zh: 胸肌 背肌

translation.en: So I would do a set of biceps curls.
translation.zh: 我会练一组二头肌

translation.en: Then I would write down next to this, one line.
translation.zh: 然后在二头肌旁边画条线

translation.en: Then I would put another line and then another line and another line.
translation.zh: 然后再画一条线 再画一条线

translation.en: Then, the next one.
translation.zh: 接着下一个

translation.en: Flies on the bench.
translation.zh: 在长凳上做推胸

translation.en: And I'd know when I did my 20 sets
translation.zh: 这样我就知道一项练习

translation.en: of a specific exercise.
translation.zh: 我做了20组

translation.en: Now after three hours of training,
translation.zh: 三小时的训练后 这面墙就会画满了

translation.en: this whole thing would be full of sets that I've done…
translation.zh: 三小时的训练后 这面墙就会画满了 我为了达到目标

translation.en: …to get to that goal that I want go.
translation.zh: 完成的训练组数

translation.en: [Arnold] The bodybuilding, there was, like, maybe, one or two events a year.
translation.zh: 健美界一年可能会有一两次活动

translation.en: Sometimes there were more than one competition a day.
translation.zh: 有时候一天会有不止一场比赛

translation.en: Like, Mr. Steíermark, which means Mr. Styria.
translation.zh: 比如“Steíermark先生” 意思是“施第里尔先生”

translation.en: And then there would be the Mr. Hercules competition,
translation.zh: 然后是“赫拉克勒斯先生”比赛

translation.en: which is usually for the guy that was the most muscular.
translation.zh: 这是那些肌肉最发达的人参加的比赛

translation.en: They would hire a local band that was really, like, hot.
translation.zh: 他们会邀请当地非常受欢迎的乐队

translation.en: They would have women who were from some exotic place
translation.zh: 他们会邀请一些异国女性

translation.en: to give the sport of bodybuilding a better reputation.
translation.zh: 为健美活动提升口碑

translation.en: Then, there would be a Mr. Austria competition,
translation.zh: 然后会有“奥地利先生”的比赛

translation.en: which is, of course, the national championships.
translation.zh: 这当然就属于全国冠军赛了

translation.en: [Arnold] This was a place where I spent a lot of time,
translation.zh: 我在这个地方度过了很多时光

translation.en: right here in this bed and in this room.
translation.zh: 就在这个房间的这张床上

translation.en: So I would be just literally, you know, lying here
translation.zh: 我会就这样躺在这里

translation.en: like this.
translation.zh: 像这样

translation.en: And just, you know, hanging here like this
translation.zh: 就这么躺在这里

translation.en: and dreaming.
translation.zh: 做梦

translation.en: And then looking up at those characters.
translation.zh: 然后抬头看看这些人

translation.en: And then sitting up.
translation.zh: 然后坐起来

translation.en: I would see Reg Park, you know, with his body,
translation.zh: 我会看到雷格·帕克 看到他的身材

translation.en: and then remembering the story
translation.zh: 想起他的故事

translation.en: of him growing up in Leeds,
translation.zh: 他是在利兹长大的

translation.en: in England.
translation.zh: 在英国

translation.en: The town was like Graz.
translation.zh: 那座城市和格拉茨一样

translation.en: It was a factory town.
translation.zh: 也是工业城市

translation.en: And the people worked hard.
translation.zh: 大家很努力地工作

translation.en: And I said to myself, "He made it out of that?"
translation.zh: 我跟自己说： “他在那种环境里成功了？

translation.en: "Then there's a chance for me also
translation.zh: 那我也同样有机会

translation.en: to make it out of here."
translation.zh: 在这里做出成绩来”

translation.en: Then you just look at any opportunity you could have to get out of here.
translation.zh: 接着你就会关注着 每一个能够离开这里的机会

translation.en: So I think that's the reason I enlisted in the military early.
translation.zh: 我想这就是我很早就去参军的原因

translation.en: In Austria, everyone serves in the military.
translation.zh: 在奥地利 每个人都要参军

translation.en: I decided to go at the age of 18.
translation.zh: 我在18岁的时候就决定要去参军

translation.en: I wanted to finish my service and then move on,
translation.zh: 我想完成我的兵役 然后继续前进

translation.en: because you could not get your passport unless you have done your military service.
translation.zh: 因为只有完成兵役 才能拿到护照

translation.en: I wanted to specialize in tank division and to become a tank driver.
translation.zh: 我想专攻坦克师 成为坦克驾驶员

translation.en: They said that's impossible. I'm too tall.
translation.zh: 他们说这是不可能的 我太高了

translation.en: My father knew a few people in the military, so I became a tank driver.
translation.zh: 我父亲认识部队里的人 于是我当上了坦克驾驶员

translation.en: Then I became the ballsiest tank driver that they had.
translation.zh: 后来我成为了 他们拥有的最骁勇的坦克驾驶员

translation.en: [Arnold] In the middle of basic training,
translation.zh: 在新兵训练的过程中

translation.en: I got the invitation to go to this competition in Stuttgart, Germany.
translation.zh: 我收到邀请去德国斯图加特参加比赛

translation.en: European's best-built man, in the junior division.
translation.zh: 青年组的“欧洲体格最佳男人”

translation.en: When I asked them, Can I go?" they said no.
translation.zh: 当我问：“我能去吗？” 他们说：“不行”

translation.en: I did not realize
translation.zh: 我当时不知道

translation.en: that when you're in the middle of the basic training, you are not allowed to leave.
translation.zh: 在新兵训练期间 是不能离开的

translation.en: I went anyway.
translation.zh: 我最终还是去了

translation.en: [Arnold] Twenty-eight guys on the stage,
translation.zh: 舞台上有28个人

translation.en: and I win.
translation.zh: 我赢了

translation.en: I saw my career in front of me.
translation.zh: 我看到了我的事业前景

translation.en: I saw myself on that Mr. Universe stage.
translation.zh: 我能想象自己站上“宇宙先生”的舞台

translation.en: I just had to replace Reg Park's head,
translation.zh: 我只需换掉雷格·帕克的脑袋

translation.en: put my head on it, and stand there with the trophy
translation.zh: 把我的头像贴上去 拿着奖杯站在那里

translation.en: and flex my muscles.
translation.zh: 绷紧我的肌肉

translation.en: And I saw
translation.zh: 然后我看到了

translation.en: the thousands of people
translation.zh: 成千上万人

translation.en: in the auditorium, in the theater, screaming,
translation.zh: 在礼堂内 在剧场里 大声叫喊着：

translation.en: "Arnold! Arnold! Arnold!"
translation.zh: “阿诺！”

translation.en: [Arnold] I saw the fantasy,
translation.zh: 我看到了这一幻象

translation.en: and it's not a dream.
translation.zh: 它不是一场梦

translation.en: I said, "No, fuck the dream. What are you gonna do with a dream?"
translation.zh: 我说：“去他妈的梦 梦能用来做什么？

translation.en: "You have to have a clear vision."
translation.zh: 你得有清晰的远景

translation.en: And when you visualize something really clearly,
translation.zh: 当你能清晰地设想某件事时

translation.en: you believe that you 100% can get there.
translation.zh: 你就会相信自己100%能达成目标

translation.en: My very first impression was
translation.zh: 我的第一印象是

translation.en: this is the most outstanding junior I ever saw in my life,
translation.zh: 这是我此生见过的 最优秀的一个年轻人

translation.en: because he had it all.
translation.zh: 因为他已经尽善尽美了

translation.en: He had a kind of charisma very unusual for that age.
translation.zh: 他有着那种年纪不常有的魅力

translation.en: He owned the stage
translation.zh: 他那么年轻就已经

translation.en: already then.
translation.zh: 掌控了舞台

translation.en: I talked to him, "What do you think to come to Munich
translation.zh: 我问他：“你觉得 到我管理的健身中心

translation.en: as trainer in the gym I manage?"
translation.zh: 来当训练生怎么样？”

translation.en: [Arnold] I was supposed to be in the military for three years.
translation.zh: 我本来应该在军队服役三年的

translation.en: So I had to ask if I can leave early.
translation.zh: 所以我不得不去咨询 我能不能早点退役

translation.en: That position that was offered to me
translation.zh: 提供给我的那个职位

translation.en: to become a trainer in a bodybuilding gym in Germany,
translation.zh: 成为德国健美运动健身中心的训练生

translation.en: was very appealing.
translation.zh: 非常诱人

translation.en: And it was kind of really the only solution
translation.zh: 它真的是唯一能够

translation.en: to get me out of Austria and one step closer to America.
translation.zh: 让我离开奥地利 离美国更近一步的方法

translation.en: You're not gonna go and become the greatest bodybuilder of all time in Austria,
translation.zh: 在奥地利 根本不可能 成为史上最优秀的健美选手

translation.en: because you need to train with the best bodybuilders around you,
translation.zh: 因为那样需要 跟最优秀的健美选手一起训练

translation.en: and the mecca of bodybuilding was America.
translation.zh: 而健美选手的圣地就是美国

translation.en: "I got to get out of here, no matter what it takes."
translation.zh: “我必须不惜一切代价离开这里”

translation.en: [Arnold] I don't look at it as, "Oh my God."
translation.zh: 我不会将其视为：“天啊

translation.en: "What a terrible upbringing I had."
translation.zh: 我的成长经历可真糟糕啊”

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: What I hated as a kid was good,
translation.zh: 小时候 我讨厌的东西其实是有益的

translation.en: because that's what drove me to get out of there.
translation.zh: 因为是它们驱使我离开了那里

translation.en: All right, let's feed the girls.
translation.zh: 好了 我们去喂姑娘们吧

translation.en: Uno, Misty!
translation.zh: 露露 威士忌！

translation.en: Uno, Misty!
translation.zh: 乌诺 米斯蒂！

translation.en: I could train longer than anyone else.
translation.zh: 我可以比其他人训练更长的时间

translation.en: I could go through misery when I traveled to other countries.
translation.zh: 去其他国家时 我可以承受住苦难

translation.en: I was able to do things that others couldn't do
translation.zh: 因为那些 我可以做到

translation.en: because of that.
translation.zh: 别人做不到的事情

translation.en: Ah, pushing him out of the way.
translation.zh: 把他推开

translation.en: It didn't bother me,
translation.zh: 这些并不会困扰我

translation.en: because it was better than where I came from.
translation.zh: 因为它们总归要好过我出生的地方

translation.en: [Arnold] When I arrived in Munich,
translation.zh: 我到了慕尼黑后

translation.en: my friend Albert Busek picked me up from the train station,
translation.zh: 我的朋友 阿尔贝特·博斯克去火车站接我

translation.en: and I moved into the gym.
translation.zh: 随后我搬进了健身中心

translation.en: There was a tiny little room,
translation.zh: 那里有一个很小的房间

translation.en: and my bed maybe was as big as the bed that I grew up with.
translation.zh: 我的床也许 跟我小时候睡的那张床差不多大

translation.en: All I had was a mixer that helped me mix my protein drinks
translation.zh: 我只有一台搅拌器 帮我搅打蛋白质饮料

translation.en: and a few clothes.
translation.zh: 还有几件衣服

translation.en: That was it.
translation.zh: 就这些

translation.en: And I stayed there for at least a year.
translation.zh: 我在那里至少待了一年

translation.en: So, at any given time,
translation.zh: 在规定的时间里

translation.en: I can go out and work out.
translation.zh: 我随时都可以出去锻炼

translation.en: I mean, how lucky of a son of a bitch am I to have the gym be my home?
translation.zh: 我是有多幸运才能以健身中心为家？

translation.en: I then developed my own little family,
translation.zh: 后来 我建立起了我自己的小家庭

translation.en: which was Albert Busek
translation.zh: 家人有阿尔贝特·博斯克

translation.en: and Franco Columbu,
translation.zh: 和弗朗哥·哥伦布

translation.en: who I met the year before in Stuttgart.
translation.zh: 我一年前在斯图加特认识了他

translation.en: He was the perfect training partner,
translation.zh: 他是最完美的训练搭档

translation.en: and he was one of the very few Italians that spoke German.
translation.zh: 他是极少数会说德语的意大利人

translation.en: [Franco] He comes from Austria. I came from Italy.
translation.zh: 他来自奥地利 我来自意大利

translation.en: And we started training together and having fun.
translation.zh: 我们开始一起训练 一起开心

translation.en: Since then, I'm one of Arnold's best friends.
translation.zh: 从那时起 我就成了阿诺最好的朋友之一

translation.en: I messed it up.
translation.zh: 我嘴瓢了

translation.en: Say that again.
translation.zh: 重录一次

translation.en: ♪ Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa… ♪
[Arnold] My friends helped me to raise money for an airline ticket
translation.zh: 我的朋友们帮我筹钱买机票

translation.en: to compete in the Mr. Universe contest.
translation.zh: 去参加“宇宙先生”的比赛

translation.en: [Arnold] So imagine, just a few months before, you're in the military.
translation.zh: 想象一下 几个月前 你还在军队服役

translation.en: And now you're traveling to London to go to the Mr. Universe contest.
translation.zh: 现在你就要 去伦敦参加“宇宙先生”的比赛了

translation.en: My goal was to place in the top six,
translation.zh: 我的目标是挤进前六名

translation.en: but I placed second
translation.zh: 但我获得了第二名

translation.en: with the age of 19.
translation.zh: 我当时只有19岁

translation.en: I said, "Oh my God."
translation.zh: 我说：“天啊

translation.en: "If I'm winning second
translation.zh: 如果我作为一个

translation.en: as this little farm boy from Austria that has no experience,
translation.zh: 毫无经验的奥地利农村小子 都能赢得亚军

translation.en: next year I'm gonna win!"
translation.zh: 那明年我一定能拿冠军了！”

translation.en: [Albert] Arnold was so gifted
translation.zh: 阿诺非常有天赋

translation.en: that regular people, the fans of bodybuilding, knew
translation.zh: 就连普通人 健美运动的粉丝们都知道

translation.en: this is the future.
translation.zh: 他就是未来

translation.en: [Arnold] At the Mr. Universe competition,
translation.zh: 在“宇宙先生”比赛中

translation.en: one of the judges was a man by the name of Wag Bennett.
translation.zh: 其中一位裁判人称逗哥班尼特

translation.en: And he'd say… [imitating Wag] "Arnold, you look fantastic. You look fantastic." "It's absolutely marvelous."
translation.zh: 他说：“阿诺 你看起来棒极了 太了不起了”

translation.en: All this British stuff, right?
translation.zh: 就是英国人那种腔调 好吧？

translation.en: He invited us to a dinner,
translation.zh: 他邀请我们共进晚餐

translation.en: and he's a judge, so I thought, "This is so unbelievable."
translation.zh: 他是裁判 所以我觉得： “这也太不可思议了”

translation.en: My English was terrible then,
translation.zh: 我当时的英文很糟糕

translation.en: so we always were laughing about it.
translation.zh: 所以我们总拿这事开玩笑

translation.en: Wag then said to me, "Well, if you ever come back, you can stay with us."
translation.zh: 逗哥跟我说： “你要是回来 可以跟我们一起住

translation.en: "You don't have to stay in a hotel."
translation.zh: 你不用去住酒店”

translation.en: The next year,
translation.zh: 第二年

translation.en: Wag organized the competition
translation.zh: 逗哥组织了比赛

translation.en: and he paid for the airline ticket to fly over there.
translation.zh: 他帮我买了过去的机票

translation.en: So I was at the Bennett's house in London,
translation.zh: 当时我在伦敦 班尼特的家里

translation.en: on 335 Romford Road.
translation.zh: 罗姆福道335号

translation.en: I remember it exactly.
translation.zh: 我记得很清楚

translation.en: And in walked Reg Park.
translation.zh: 然后雷格·帕克走了进来

translation.en: Meeting Reg Park
translation.zh: 和雷格·帕克见面

translation.en: was, like, one of those extraordinary moments.
translation.zh: 是一个奇妙动人的时刻

translation.en: You see him in magazines.
translation.zh: 你在杂志上看到他

translation.en: You see him in movies.
translation.zh: 你在电影里看到他

translation.en: And then all of a sudden, there he is.
translation.zh: 然后 突然之间 他来到了你面前

translation.en: He just came from South Africa and he wants to work out.
translation.zh: 他刚从南非过来 他想去健身

translation.en: And then we're working out together.
translation.zh: 然后我们就一起去健身了

translation.en: I remember that he didn't even… he didn't even take off his sweater.
translation.zh: 我记得他甚至都没有… 他甚至都没有脱掉他的运动衫

translation.en: And it was just extraordinary to see Hercules
translation.zh: 能见到电影里的赫拉克勒斯…

translation.en: that you saw in the movies, to see him in front of you,
translation.zh: 活生生地站在你面前 那种感觉简直无与伦比

translation.en: and then to have a conversation and to have him be so nice.
translation.zh: 然后还能一起聊天 感受他的友善

translation.en: He knew everything about me,
translation.zh: 他知道我的所有事情

translation.en: because Wag Bennett told him.
translation.zh: 因为逗哥班尼特都告诉他了

translation.en: To really motivate me, he said to me,
translation.zh: 真正激励了我的一点 是他跟我说：

translation.en: "If you win the Mr. Universe contest,
translation.zh: “如果你赢了‘宇宙先生’大赛

translation.en: I'm gonna bring you down to South Africa."
translation.zh: 我就带你去南非

translation.en: "And I'm gonna have you do posing exhibitions." I'm gonna pay you for each positing exhibition."
translation.zh: 我会让你做健美肌肉展示 每一场我都会付钱给你

translation.en: "You can make some money there, and you're gonna see the entire country."
translation.zh: 你可以赚点钱 还能游览整个国家”

translation.en: [Arnold] There's no room for mistakes,
translation.zh: 我不能出错

translation.en: because I have to be Mr. Universe in 1967.
translation.zh: 因为我必须参加1967年的“宇宙先生”

translation.en: Wag would say, "You gotta train your calves."
translation.zh: 逗哥说：“练练你的小腿

translation.en: "Your biceps are much larger than your calves."
translation.zh: 你的二头肌比小腿大多了

translation.en: "The calves are skinny, and the whole proportion is off."
translation.zh: 小腿太瘦了 比例不匀称”

translation.en: If you want to win,
translation.zh: 如果你想赢

translation.en: you need to be fine-tuned and you have to have everything at ten.
translation.zh: 你就必须面面俱到 在各方面都做到十分

translation.en: Finally, it all came together.
translation.zh: 终于 一切都完备了

translation.en: [announcer] And the winner,
translation.zh: 获胜者是…

translation.en: Arnold Schwarzenegger!
translation.zh: 阿诺·施瓦辛格！

translation.en: [Arnold] At the age of 20,
translation.zh: 20岁的时候

translation.en: I made my vision
translation.zh: 我将我的构想

translation.en: become a reality.
translation.zh: 变成了现实

translation.en: On that very same stage that Reg Park won it,
translation.zh: 在雷格·帕克赢得它的同一个舞台上

translation.en: and I got exactly the same trophy that he got.
translation.zh: 我拿到了和他一模一样的奖杯

translation.en: And exactly the way I envisioned it.
translation.zh: 与我设想的场景丝毫不差

translation.en: All the people were screaming.
translation.zh: 所有的人都在尖叫

translation.en: [Arnold] I felt like, "This is like a fairy tale."
translation.zh: 我觉得：“这就像个童话故事一样”

translation.en: Everything falls into place.
translation.zh: 一切都成为了现实

translation.en: Reg Park invites me to Johannesburg
translation.zh: 雷格·帕克邀请我去约翰尼斯堡

translation.en: to stay in his house.
translation.zh: 住在他家里

translation.en: Do you know what that did to me?
translation.zh: 你知道那对我有什么影响吗？

translation.en: I'm getting invited by my idol to go to his home turf.
translation.zh: 我的偶像邀请我去他家里

translation.en: [man] I met Arnold when he came here.
translation.zh: 阿诺来我家时 我认识了他

translation.en: I was, uh, nine at the time.
translation.zh: 我当时九岁

translation.en: He was very polite. He was well-mannered.
translation.zh: 他谦谦有礼 文质彬彬

translation.en: He would wear sandals and socks, you know?
translation.zh: 他会穿着袜子穿拖鞋 你懂吗？

translation.en: Like a country bumpkin, so to speak.
translation.zh: 可以说 像乡巴佬一样

translation.en: Lily-white skin. Everybody on the beach had a tan.
translation.zh: 白皙如雪的皮肤 海滩上的所有人都有古铜色的皮肤

translation.en: I remember him almost being in awe,
translation.zh: 我记得他几乎可以说是毕恭毕敬的

translation.en: but my dad made him feel so comfortable.
translation.zh: 但我爸爸让他觉得非常自在

translation.en: My mother, you know, of course, made him feel so comfortable as well.
translation.zh: 我妈妈 当然也让他感觉很自在

translation.en: He immediately became part of the family.
translation.zh: 他立刻就成为了我们家的一份子

translation.en: We'd go out to meals together every night and go to movies.
translation.zh: 我们每天晚上 都一起出去吃饭 看电影

translation.en: What he really learned from my parents was how important family was.
translation.zh: 他真正从我父母身上学到的 是家庭的重要性

translation.en: I think that impressed him more than anything else.
translation.zh: 我想这一点对他的影响 要远大于其他任何事

translation.en: My mother gave Arnold some pointers.
translation.zh: 我妈妈给了阿诺一些建议

translation.en: You know, he could do the basic poses, but there was no flow and transition.
translation.zh: 他可以完成那些基本动作 但其中缺乏了灵动感与过度

translation.en: So she helped him put his routine together.
translation.zh: 于是她帮他把他的动作串在了一起

translation.en: [Arnold] Mareon was a ballet teacher.
translation.zh: 玛丽昂是芭蕾舞老师

translation.en: She taught Reg how to be more graceful on stage.
translation.zh: 她教会了雷格 如何在舞台上表现得更优雅

translation.en: You couldn't get more two opposites. Ballet is all about grace.
translation.zh: 两种截然相反的东西无法兼得 芭蕾是全然优雅的

translation.en: Then you have bodybuilding, which is kind of blocky
translation.zh: 然后是健美运动 它与优雅毫无关系

translation.en: and not much movement.
translation.zh: 也没有太多的动作

translation.en: I didn't understand it all,
translation.zh: 我当时并不是太理解

translation.en: but then, as time went on, I started utilizing what she taught me.
translation.zh: 但后来 随着时间的推移 我开始运用她教我的东西

translation.en: When I was a kid, I was shy,
translation.zh: 小时候 我很害羞

translation.en: and bodybuilding
translation.zh: 而健美运动

translation.en: was a sport where you had to perform.
translation.zh: 是一项你必须大胆展示的运动

translation.en: So I could learn it in my own way,
translation.zh: 所以我就用自己的方式去学习

translation.en: to perform and to pose on stage.
translation.zh: 学习表演 在舞台上摆姿势

translation.en: And people then correct you and say, you know, "Smile more when you perform,"
translation.zh: 有人会纠正你： “你表演的时候应该多点笑容”

translation.en: and do this and do that.
translation.zh: 诸如此类的

translation.en: This is how it slowly came about
translation.zh: 我就是这样慢慢地

translation.en: to become an entertainer
translation.zh: 变成了一名表演者

translation.en: and really enjoying the moment.
translation.zh: 真正开始享受那个时刻

translation.en: In 1968, I went and competed at the Mr. Universe contest in London.
translation.zh: 1968年 我去伦敦 参加了“宇宙先生”大赛

translation.en: Every time they called out a pose…
translation.zh: 他们每喊出一个姿势…

translation.en: If I did a double bicep pose, I had the biggest biceps.
translation.zh: 如果我做双手二头肌的姿势 我的二头肌是所有人中最大的

translation.en: Then, when we turned around and do a back pose,
translation.zh: 然后我们转身做后背的姿势

translation.en: there's no one that's going to have this kind of a back.
translation.zh: 没有人拥有这样的背部

translation.en: So I knew I'm gonna win.
translation.zh: 于是我知道 我赢定了

translation.en: I win the second Mr. Universe title. I feel, like, at an all-time high.
translation.zh: 我第二次赢得了“宇宙先生”的头衔 我感受到了前所未有的兴奋

translation.en: And I'm about to go back to Munich,
translation.zh: 在正准备回慕尼黑时

translation.en: when I get a telegram
translation.zh: 我收到了一份电报

translation.en: from Joe Weider.
translation.zh: 是乔·韦德发来的

translation.en: I said to myself, "Oh my God."
translation.zh: 我跟自己说：“天呐

translation.en: "Joe Weider? He's like the godfather of bodybuilding."
translation.zh: 乔·韦德？ 他可以说是健美界的教父”

translation.en: The trainer of champions since 1939.
translation.zh: 从1939年起 就是冠军训练员

translation.en: All of the guys that win Mr. Universe and Mr. World,
translation.zh: 所有赢得“宇宙先生” 和“世界先生”的人

translation.en: they have been trained by Joe Weider.
translation.zh: 都是由乔·韦德训练的

translation.en: And it says in the telegram,
translation.zh: 电报上说：

translation.en: "I'm inviting you to come to Miami to our Mr. Universe competition,"
translation.zh: “我诚邀你到迈阿密来 参加我们的‘宇宙先生’比赛”

translation.en: because there was two.
translation.zh: 因为有两种“宇宙先生”

translation.en: Weider started a Mr. Universe in the 60s in America.
translation.zh: 韦德于1960年代 在美国开创了他自己的“宇宙先生”

translation.en: I didn't go back home. I didn't pick up any of my belongings.
translation.zh: 我没有回家 我没有拿任何行李

translation.en: I called Albert and I called Franco and said, "Look."
translation.zh: 我打了电话给阿尔贝特 还有弗朗哥 我说：“听着

translation.en: "I just got an invitation from Weider. I'm not coming back."
translation.zh: 我刚收到了韦德发来的邀请 我不回去了

translation.en: "I'm gonna move to America."
translation.zh: 我要搬去美国了

translation.en: "Bye-bye."
translation.zh: 再见”

translation.en: ♪ I got the feelin' ♪
translation.zh: （肯尼迪机场）

translation.en: When I came to America, I felt like…
translation.zh: 我刚到美国时 我觉得…

translation.en: …finally, I'm in my home.
translation.zh: 我终于回到家了

translation.en: Then we got flew down to Florida.
translation.zh: 然后我们飞到了佛罗里达

translation.en: [Arnold] I was absolutely convinced
translation.zh: 我坚信

translation.en: that I'm gonna beat all the American bodybuilders.
translation.zh: 我会战胜所有的美国健美选手

translation.en: Set me up as kind of, like, the new champion.
translation.zh: 让自己成为新晋冠军

translation.en: Become the greatest bodybuilder of all times.
translation.zh: 成为有史以来最优秀的健美选手

translation.en: He was acting so arrogant and cocky like the winner, but he wasn't in shape,
translation.zh: 他表现得像获胜者一样 傲慢自大 但他的状态并不达标

translation.en: because it was all about being big and, you know, size with him.
translation.zh: 因为他专注于把所有部位练得很大

translation.en: [Arnold] And when they announced the fourth place, third place,
translation.zh: 当他们宣布第四名 第三名

translation.en: and the second place, Arnold Schwarzenegger.
translation.zh: 然后第二名时 阿诺·施瓦辛格

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: This can't be.
translation.zh: 这不可能

translation.en: I once was considered the unbeatable guy, and now, all of a sudden, Frank Zane won.
translation.zh: 我曾经被认为是不可战胜的人 但现在忽然之间 弗兰克·赞恩赢了

translation.en: This is terrible. I'm embarrassed.
translation.zh: 这太可怕了 我非常窘迫

translation.en: [Frank] I think he was just used to winning all the time.
translation.zh: 我想他已经习惯了每次都能获胜

translation.en: Landing in this country the first time, getting defeated
translation.zh: 第一次来到这个国家 被人打败了

translation.en: by, as his words,
translation.zh: 而对方是 用他的话说

translation.en: "a chicken with 17-inch arms,"
translation.zh: “一只手臂长43厘米的鸡仔…”

translation.en: that really bothered him.
translation.zh: 这让他非常恼火

translation.en: [Arnold] I was so devastated.
translation.zh: 我觉得五雷轰顶

translation.en: I was lying there in the middle of the night in bed
translation.zh: 半夜 我躺在那里

translation.en: in this hotel room,
translation.zh: 躺在酒店房间里的床上

translation.en: and I thought the world is coming to an end.
translation.zh: 我觉得世界末日仿佛来临了

translation.en: I'm in a strange country.
translation.zh: 我在一个陌生的国家

translation.en: I cannot communicate here.
translation.zh: 在这里我没有人可以倾诉

translation.en: I'm thousands of miles away from home.
translation.zh: 我跟家乡远隔万里

translation.en: And I just lost.
translation.zh: 我输了

translation.en: I just disappointed everybody.
translation.zh: 我辜负了所有人

translation.en: So in my mind, the bodybuilding world was going to say,
translation.zh: 所以在我脑子里 健美界会说：

translation.en: "Schwarzenegger is not what we thought he is."
translation.zh: “施瓦辛格名不副实

translation.en: "So fuck him."
translation.zh: 让他滚蛋吧”

translation.en: I cried the whole night.
translation.zh: 我哭了一整晚

translation.en: The next day, I said, "Okay."
translation.zh: 第二天 我说：“好吧

translation.en: "You cried like a little baby, you asshole."
translation.zh: 你哭得像小婴儿一样 你个混蛋

translation.en: "And now, let's move on."
translation.zh: 现在让我们继续前进吧”

translation.en: And then Weider gave me an airline ticket to go to Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 然后韦德给了我一张去洛杉矶的机票

translation.en: He's gonna take care of things and he's gonna get me an apartment.
translation.zh: 他会安排好一切 帮我找一套公寓

translation.en: I wrote to my friends right away. I said, "This is quite different."
translation.zh: 我立刻给我的朋友们写了信 我说：“这里非常不一样”

translation.en: I felt, like, totally helpless
translation.zh: 我觉得非常无助

translation.en: and alone.
translation.zh: 非常孤独

translation.en: The gyms that I went to
translation.zh: 我去的那些健身中心

translation.en: were gyms where the best bodybuilders worked out.
translation.zh: 都是最优秀的健美选手们会去的地方

translation.en: I come in there and I want to work out.
translation.zh: 我进去想要锻炼一下

translation.en: And there's guys that owned the gym, like, Vince Gironda,
translation.zh: 然后有些健身中心的老板 比如文斯·吉龙达

translation.en: he owned Vince's Gym.
translation.zh: 他是文斯健身中心的老板

translation.en: He says, "You're still a baby."
translation.zh: 他说：“你还是一个小宝宝

translation.en: "We have to get rid of a lot of fat on you,
translation.zh: 我们必须把你身上的许多脂肪都甩掉

translation.en: but you have a lot of potential."
translation.zh: 但你很有潜力”

translation.en: And I said to myself, "What the fuck is he talking about? Potential?"
translation.zh: 然后我心想： “他在说什么呢？潜力？”

translation.en: Then I trained at Gold's Gym,
translation.zh: 然后我去了戈尔德健身中心训练

translation.en: and Joe Gold immediately called me "Balloon Belly."
translation.zh: 乔·戈尔德立刻就说我是：“气球肚”

translation.en: I said,
translation.zh: 我说：

translation.en: "Jesus."
translation.zh: “天呐”

translation.en: I realized why it was so important to come to America,
translation.zh: 我意识到了 为什么来美国这么重要

translation.en: because they just have a whole different understanding
translation.zh: 因为他们对好身材

translation.en: of what it means being in shape.
translation.zh: 有着截然不同的理解

translation.en: I alone cannot accomplish anything.
translation.zh: 我独自一人什么事都成不了

translation.en: I need help.
translation.zh: 我需要帮助

translation.en: So I invited Frank Zane, the guy that I was beaten by,
translation.zh: 于是我邀请了弗兰克·赞恩 那个赢了我的人

translation.en: to come out to California
translation.zh: 到加利福尼亚来

translation.en: and to train with me,
translation.zh: 和我一起训练

translation.en: because I wanted to see firsthand
translation.zh: 我想亲眼看看

translation.en: what does he do to get this kind of a quality of a physique.
translation.zh: 他为了获得这样的体格都做了些什么

translation.en: And I stayed with him on a cot in his living room,
translation.zh: 我和他住在一起 睡在他客厅里的行军床上

translation.en: and we'd go to the gym and train.
translation.zh: 我们会一起去健身中心训练

translation.en: Go to the beach. Take pictures for Weider.
translation.zh: 去海滩 为韦德拍照

translation.en: I went back to Florida
translation.zh: 我回到了佛罗里达

translation.en: and resigned my teaching position and moved to California.
translation.zh: 辞去教职 搬去了加利福尼亚

translation.en: [Arnold] And then, when I was training here,
translation.zh: 当我在这里训练时

translation.en: especially in Gold's Gym, I felt like,
translation.zh: 尤其在戈尔德健身中心时 我觉得：

translation.en: "Wouldn't it be great if Franco would see what's going on here?"
translation.zh: “如果弗朗哥能看到这里的情况 那岂不是很好？”

translation.en: I mean, he was my close friend and training partner in Munich.
translation.zh: 他是我在慕尼黑的好友兼训练搭档

translation.en: I really missed him.
translation.zh: 我真的很想他

translation.en: But when Weider heard what his height was, he had no interest at all.
translation.zh: 但当韦德听说了他的身高后 他对这事毫无兴趣

translation.en: So he kept saying, "No, I don't want to bring over a little guy like that."
translation.zh: 他不断说：“我可不想 带这么一个小个子过来

translation.en: "Come on."
translation.zh: 拜托”

translation.en: And then eventually Artie Zeller, the photographer, and I,
translation.zh: 最终 摄影师阿迪·泽勒和我

translation.en: we kind of convinced him.
translation.zh: 我们说服了他

translation.en: And from then, I mean, everything really picked up.
translation.zh: 从此以后 一切都开始加速进行了

translation.en: Cinque, sei, sette.
translation.zh: 五 六 七

translation.en: -[groans] -[Arnold] What?
translation.zh: 七 怎么了？

translation.en: Sette.
translation.zh: 七

translation.en: Otto.
translation.zh: 八

translation.en: Nove.
translation.zh: 九

translation.en: Dieci.
translation.zh: 十

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Arnold] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -That's hard. -[Franco] I get it.
translation.zh: -这很困难 -我能行的

translation.en: -I get it. -[Arnold] Oh, Franco gets it.
translation.zh: -我能行的 -哦 弗朗哥能行

translation.en: -Okay, pick it up. -[both laughing]
translation.zh: 好吧 你可以帮我一下

translation.en: [Arnold] In that area of building a community,
translation.zh: 在建立社群方面

translation.en: the talent of mine was actually better
translation.zh: 我的天赋

translation.en: than my talent in bodybuilding.
translation.zh: 比在健美上更胜一筹

translation.en: [Arnold] Gold's Gym in Venice Beach.
translation.zh: 戈尔德健身中心位于威尼斯海滩

translation.en: Bodybuilders training for championships went there to train.
translation.zh: 想要夺冠的健美选手都会去那里训练

translation.en: [Arnold] And then Joe Weider publicized it as the champions' gym.
translation.zh: 后来乔·韦德 把它宣传成为了冠军健身中心

translation.en: -[man] That nose will look skinny now. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 那鼻子现在看起来很瘦

translation.en: My first impression of him was he was outgoing, funny,
translation.zh: 我对他的第一印象 他很外向 风趣

translation.en: and always cracking jokes.
translation.zh: 总爱开玩笑

translation.en: When he was in the gym, he was focused.
translation.zh: 在健身中心的时候 他非常专注

translation.en: [Frank] It was all energy, and we helped each other.
translation.zh: 那里氛围浓厚 我们会互相帮助

translation.en: Now, Arnold was a great person to have in the gym when you're working out,
translation.zh: 有阿诺在健身中心是件非常棒的事情

translation.en: because just his presence made you want to work out harder
translation.zh: 他的出现会让你想要更努力地锻炼

translation.en: just to impress him.
translation.zh: 只为了让他惊艳

translation.en: He was a perfectionist.
translation.zh: 他是完美主义者

translation.en: [Arnold] You train together, help each other.
translation.zh: 你们一起训练 互相帮助

translation.en: You even help each other pumping up backstage with the towels,
translation.zh: 你们甚至在后台用毛巾互相加油打气

translation.en: and you oil each other up.
translation.zh: 互相帮忙抹油

translation.en: You put the oil on me because I cannot reach in the back. Someone has to put the oil on my back.
translation.zh: 你涂油是因为我够不着 得有人帮我涂背

translation.en: That's what you do. You help each other.
translation.zh: 这就是我们的作风 互相帮助

translation.en: And then before you go out, you say, "Good luck."
translation.zh: 然后在你出发前 会说：“祝你好运”

translation.en: I used to say, "Good luck," and "I'm going to beat you."
translation.zh: 我以前会说：“祝你好运” 以及“我会赢你的”

translation.en: [Arnold] I was never a fanatic about diet.
translation.zh: 我向来都不是一个节食狂

translation.en: It was Frank Zane and Franco Columbu
translation.zh: 是弗兰克·赞恩和弗朗哥·哥伦布

translation.en: who put my vitamins together.
translation.zh: 把我的维生素搭配好

translation.en: And then we would experiment with steroids.
translation.zh: 然后我们会尝试用类固醇

translation.en: Everybody in the bodybuilding field who is up there on the top
translation.zh: 在健美界 每一个佼佼者

translation.en: is taking steroids.
translation.zh: 都在服用类固醇

translation.en: Maybe five percent of my progress
translation.zh: 我的进步也许有5%

translation.en: is from the steroids.
translation.zh: 是来自类固醇的功劳

translation.en: I had doctor's supervision.
translation.zh: 我有医生的监督

translation.en: You stayed with a very strict rule of doing it four months a year
translation.zh: 规则十分严格 每年在赛前

translation.en: before a competition, and then lay off.
translation.zh: 服用四个月 然后就停止

translation.en: So I changed my eating habits and everything.
translation.zh: 我因此改变了我的饮食习惯

translation.en: I got really tanned.
translation.zh: 我晒得非常黝黑

translation.en: If your whole personality is to show off,
translation.zh: 如果你的个性就是要炫耀

translation.en: you can't wait to show people what you have.
translation.zh: 那你会迫不及待地 向大家展示你所拥有的

translation.en: There were hundreds of people watching guys work out.
translation.zh: 有成百上千人在看大家锻炼

translation.en: [Arnold] I felt like I was living in the middle of a circus.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己仿佛生活在马戏团一样

translation.en: So you were getting it all times,
translation.zh: 你随时都能得到那种满足感

translation.en: the satisfaction of people watching you
translation.zh: 大家围观着你

translation.en: and saying, "Wow, he looks incredible."
translation.zh: 然后说：“哇 他看起来好棒啊”

translation.en: [woman] It was the summer of '69.
translation.zh: 当时是1969年夏天

translation.en: I was working as a hostess at Zucky's Deli.
translation.zh: 我在祖克熟食店当服务员

translation.en: He came over to me and he said,
translation.zh: 他走过来对我说：

translation.en: "You are so sexy."
translation.zh: “你好性感

translation.en: "I need to ask you out on a date."
translation.zh: 我必须邀请你跟我约会”

translation.en: With a really thick accent.
translation.zh: 他的口音非常重

translation.en: Barely 100 words in his vocabulary.
translation.zh: 他的词汇量几乎不到100个

translation.en: He was handsome. He was magnetic.
translation.zh: 他很帅 很有吸引力

translation.en: He was charismatic.
translation.zh: 魅力四射

translation.en: He was just different.
translation.zh: 他非常与众不同

translation.en: When he arrived for our date, I was watching the moon landing.
translation.zh: 他来赴约时 我正在看登月

translation.en: So we watched it together. We took photos in front of the television.
translation.zh: 于是我们开始一起看 我们在电视机前拍照

translation.en: [man 2 over radio] Tranquility base here. The eagle has landed.
translation.zh: 这里是宁静基地 老鹰已着陆

translation.en: [Barbara] After our first date,
translation.zh: 我们第一次约会之后

translation.en: we saw each other all the time that we could.
translation.zh: 我们一有机会就会见面

translation.en: He created laughter everywhere.
translation.zh: 他到处制造笑声

translation.en: He was just so
translation.zh: 他就是非常

translation.en: mesmerizing.
translation.zh: 有魅力

translation.en: [Arnold] Barbara was the first time
translation.zh: 我是通过芭芭拉

translation.en: that I saw, through her, kind of how America celebrates Christmas,
translation.zh: 才第一次见识到 美国是如何庆祝圣诞节的

translation.en: because she would take me home,
translation.zh: 因为她会带我回家去

translation.en: and the family would just be so inclusive.
translation.zh: 她的家人非常包容

translation.en: It was the first time
translation.zh: 那是我人生首次

translation.en: in my life that I ever celebrated a birthday,
translation.zh: 庆祝生日

translation.en: when Barbara's mother made a birthday cake.
translation.zh: 芭芭拉的母亲做了一个生日蛋糕

translation.en: I never got a cake. No one ever sang "Happy Birthday" or anything.
translation.zh: 我从没得到过蛋糕 从来没人为我唱过《生日快乐歌》

translation.en: I don't know why.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么

translation.en: It gave me another way of really appreciating
translation.zh: 它给了我又一种好好体会

translation.en: the American way of life,
translation.zh: 美国生活方式的方法

translation.en: and to have a normal life.
translation.zh: 让我过上了正常的生活

translation.en: But with my family…
translation.zh: 至于我的家人…

translation.en: The communication with my parents was not good.
translation.zh: 我和父母的沟通不太顺畅

translation.en: And my brother…
translation.zh: 而我哥哥…

translation.en: I kind of erased him out of my mind
translation.zh: 在我从事健美运动的那些年里

translation.en: for years during my bodybuilding years.
translation.zh: 我几乎把他从我的记忆中抹去了

translation.en: I felt like I was creating my own life over here,
translation.zh: 我觉得我在这里 建立起了我自己的生活

translation.en: and I wanted nothing to do with my past life.
translation.zh: 我不想和我过去的生活再有瓜葛

translation.en: Joe Weider was interested in trying to figure out how does he sell me.
translation.zh: 乔·韦德热衷于思考要如何推销我

translation.en: So he came up with this idea
translation.zh: 他想到了一个主意

translation.en: that I'm this German machine.
translation.zh: 我是一个德国机器人

translation.en: No emotions, just marching forward,
translation.zh: 没有情感 只会不断向前

translation.en: and it's going to make me the champion.
translation.zh: 这将使我成为冠军

translation.en: And I loved it, because that's what I saw myself,
translation.zh: 我非常喜欢这主意 因为这正是我对自己的看法

translation.en: as someone that couldn't be stopped.
translation.zh: 我是一个无法被阻止的人

translation.en: Joe Weider had one goal in mind, and that is that I win every competition.
translation.zh: 乔·韦德的心中只有一个目标 那就是我能赢得每一场比赛

translation.en: That I'm on the cover of his magazine.
translation.zh: 我能被印在他的杂志封面上

translation.en: That I sell a shitload of food supplements for him.
translation.zh: 我能帮他卖出去一大堆食物补充剂

translation.en: And that everything that I did,
translation.zh: 而且我做的每件事

translation.en: he would use the name Weider for it.
translation.zh: 他都能用“韦德”为其命名

translation.en: So when I came up with
translation.zh: 所以当我想到

translation.en: splitting my bicep training with my tricep training,
translation.zh: 要把我的二头肌训练 和三头肌训练进行拆分时

translation.en: he called it The Weider Split Routine.
translation.zh: 他将其称为“韦德拆分动作”

translation.en: So that was the deal.
translation.zh: 就是这么回事

translation.en: [Weider] I'm just gonna go over this.
translation.zh: 我得再说一下

translation.en: You should have unique pictures taken, Arnold.
translation.zh: 阿诺 你应该有自己独特的照片

translation.en: Make it look different.
translation.zh: 让它不同一般

translation.en: I had to go and work with him and say,
translation.zh: 我必须跟他合作 然后说：

translation.en: "Joe, you're selling your products. You're making millions of dollars."
translation.zh: “乔 你卖你的产品 你赚了几百万美元

translation.en: "I want to also sell some products of mine."
translation.zh: 我也想卖一些我的产品

translation.en: "All I need from you is give me advertisement space in your magazine."
translation.zh: 我只需要你在你的杂志里 分我一点广告位

translation.en: I wanted to make money and I wanted to turn one dollar into two.
translation.zh: 我想赚钱 我想把一美元变两美元

translation.en: And I wanted to learn how to do that in America the American way.
translation.zh: 我想学习如何 用美国的方式在美国赚钱

translation.en: I said to Joe Weider,
translation.zh: 我跟乔·韦德说：

translation.en: "Can you help me? I want to go to college to learn English."
translation.zh: “你能帮我吗？我想去大学学英语

translation.en: "Then I wanna take some business classes,
translation.zh: 我还想上一些商务课程

translation.en: because eventually I may have to take over your operation."
translation.zh: 因为最终 我也许必需接管你的业务”

translation.en: And he loved that.
translation.zh: 他很喜欢这想法

translation.en: These are the new covers.
translation.zh: 这些是新的封面

translation.en: [Arnold] Let me see it.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: We don't want to put him on the cover. Come on, Joe.
translation.zh: 拜托 我们可不想拿他来当封面

translation.en: You told me one time that you're only putting Mr. Universes or Mr. Olympias on the cover. [Joe] Five more copies…
translation.zh: 你以前跟我说过 你只会用 “宇宙先生”或“奥林匹亚先生”做封面

translation.en: [Arnold] Joe?
translation.zh: 乔？

translation.en: [Arnold] Every time I want anything,
translation.zh: 每次获胜后

translation.en: I say to myself, "Okay, now what's the next thing?"
translation.zh: 我都会跟自己说： “好吧 接下来是什么？”

translation.en: If you're always hungry, you're never really satisfied.
translation.zh: 如果你一直保持饥渴 你就永远不会真的得到满足

translation.en: Because Reg Park, of course, won three Mr. Universe contests,
translation.zh: 因为雷格·帕克 赢过三届“宇宙先生”大赛

translation.en: Arnold has to break that record.
translation.zh: 阿诺必须打破这项纪录

translation.en: When people think, "This is too much." For me, it was definitely not enough.
translation.zh: 当大家认为“这样太多了” 对我来说 绝对还远远不够

translation.en: And then I wanted more.
translation.zh: 我还想要更多

translation.en: [Jon Jon] My dad had retired,
translation.zh: 我爸爸已经退休了

translation.en: but he decided to compete in Mr. Universe.
translation.zh: 但他决定要去参加“宇宙先生”比赛

translation.en: At that time, my dad was 42.
translation.zh: 当时 我爸爸42岁

translation.en: Arnold was 23.
translation.zh: 阿诺23岁

translation.en: [Arnold] Someone told me, "Do you know who else is competing this year?"
translation.zh: 有人跟我说： “你知道你的对手是谁吗？”

translation.en: And I say, "Who?"
translation.zh: 我说：“谁？”

translation.en: They said, "Reg Park."
translation.zh: 他们说：“雷格·帕克”

translation.en: I said, "Come on. This is impossible."
translation.zh: 我说：“拜托 这不可能”

translation.en: I felt kind of weird to compete against my idol.
translation.zh: 跟我的偶像比赛 我觉得有些奇怪

translation.en: And then won.
translation.zh: 后来我赢了

translation.en: When that happened, it was something really weird that happened mentally to me.
translation.zh: 当这一刻来临时 我觉得有种奇怪的感觉

translation.en: I felt guilty somewhat.
translation.zh: 不知怎么的 我有些罪恶感

translation.en: That my ego got in the way or maybe I shouldn't have competed that year.
translation.zh: 我的自负在作祟 也许那一年我不该去参赛的

translation.en: To know that, as a 15-year-old kid, you were dreaming about that
translation.zh: 当你还是一个15岁的孩子的时候 你就梦想着这样

translation.en: and you were idolizing it.
translation.zh: 将其奉为偶像

translation.en: And now, all of a sudden, you become the one
translation.zh: 现在 突然之间 你变成了

translation.en: that others are idolizing.
translation.zh: 别人的偶像

translation.en: I made this vision become a reality.
translation.zh: 我把这种构想变成了现实

translation.en: My mind is just geared differently. You know, it's geared towards moving forward.
translation.zh: 我的思维方式非常不同 那就是不断地在向前驱动

translation.en: [Arnold] What is the new thing?
translation.zh: 有什么新的东西？

translation.en: A new challenge. A new mountain to climb.
translation.zh: 新的挑战 新的山峰等待攀越

translation.en: Mr. Universe is a world championship title,
translation.zh: “宇宙先生”是一个世界冠军头衔

translation.en: but every year there's a Mr. Universe.
translation.zh: 但每年都会有一位“宇宙先生”

translation.en: But who is really, then, the best?
translation.zh: 但谁才是最优秀的呢？

translation.en: [Arnold] So Joe Weider created the Mr. Olympia,
translation.zh: 乔·韦德因此创立了“奥林匹亚先生”

translation.en: where all the Mr. Universes and all the world champions
translation.zh: 所有的“宇宙先生”和世界冠军

translation.en: competes in the Mr. Olympia.
translation.zh: 都会在“奥林匹亚先生”一较高下

translation.en: If you win that, then you can call yourself the best.
translation.zh: 如果你在那项比赛中获胜了 那你才能说自己是最优秀的

translation.en: Pow!
translation.zh: 砰！

translation.en: Mr. Olympia!
translation.zh: 奥林匹亚先生！

translation.en: The year 1969, that was my first Mr. Olympia.
translation.zh: 1969年 是我第一次参加“奥林匹亚先生”

translation.en: It was a different league.
translation.zh: 那是一项完全不同的联赛

translation.en: I competed against Sergio Oliva.
translation.zh: 我的对手是塞尔吉奥·奥利瓦

translation.en: I lost against him.
translation.zh: 我输给了他

translation.en: He was better than me.
translation.zh: 他比我更优秀

translation.en: I gave him a big kiss on stage,
translation.zh: 我在台上给了他一个大大的吻

translation.en: and I said, "Enjoy it, because this is the last time."
translation.zh: 然后我说： “好好享受吧 这是最后一次了”

translation.en: The next year I came back with vengeance.
translation.zh: 第二年 我怀着复仇的心态回来了

translation.en: I had to kind of make him the villain,
translation.zh: 我不得不把他设想成反派

translation.en: to go and train harder and harder and harder.
translation.zh: 只为让自己更卖力地训练

translation.en: I finally got the chance to confront him.
translation.zh: 我终于有机会和他正面交锋了

translation.en: I then pulled a little trick on him.
translation.zh: 然后我跟他耍了个心眼

translation.en: We were doing pose-off after pose-off.
translation.zh: 我们正在不断完成一个又一个的姿势

translation.en: And then I said to him, "I think it's enough."
translation.zh: 然后我说：“我觉得差不多了

translation.en: "I think they must know by now
translation.zh: 他们现在肯定已经知道

translation.en: who is going to be the winner."
translation.zh: 冠军是谁了”

translation.en: He says, "You're right," and then he walked off.
translation.zh: 他说：“你说得对” 然后他就走了

translation.en: And then I pointed at him, like, "He's giving up."
translation.zh: 然后我指着他说：“他放弃了”

translation.en: So it was like a psychological little trick to kind of close the deal once and for all.
translation.zh: 这就像一个心理技巧 可以让我们永远都保持对手的状态

translation.en: He turned around and said, "You son of a bitch."
translation.zh: 他转过身来说：“你个王八蛋”

translation.en: [chuckles] He was, like, really pissed off about it.
translation.zh: 他当时真的非常生气

translation.en: [Arnold] In the '70s, I kept being driven to go from title to title.
translation.zh: 1970年代期间 我在不断地追逐一个又一个的头衔

translation.en: I was so far ahead of everybody else that I ran over everybody.
translation.zh: 至此 我一直领先于所有人 我碾压着所有人

translation.en: ♪ Super guy ♪
translation.zh: （1972年 奥林匹亚先生）

translation.en: ♪ Oh ♪
translation.zh: （1973年 奥林匹亚先生）

translation.en: -[man] What do you expect to see tonight? -[man 2] I'm not quite sure.
translation.zh: -你对今晚有何期待？ -我不太确定

translation.en: I'm curious to see what it's… what it looks like.
translation.zh: 我很好奇它会是什么样子

translation.en: [man 3] Can we ask what you expect tonight? I expect to see fantastic bodybuilders.
translation.zh: -可以问问你对今晚有什么期待吗？ -我期待能看到优秀的健美选手们

translation.en: -[man 3] Have you ever been to one before? -No.
translation.zh: -你以前参加过这种活动吗？ -没有

translation.en: -[man 3] Have you ever been to one before? -Never!
translation.zh: -你以前参加过这种活动吗？ -从来没有！

translation.en: -Have you? -[man 3] Never.
translation.zh: -你呢？ -从来没有

translation.en: [Arnold] Being a bodybuilder is like being an artist,
translation.zh: 健美选手就像艺术家一样

translation.en: being a sculptor like Rodin or Michelangelo,
translation.zh: 就像罗丹或 米开朗基罗那样的雕塑家一样

translation.en: because you have to have a sense of symmetry and beauty.
translation.zh: 因为你必须具有对称感和美感

translation.en: [Arnold] If you don't have that, the whole thing together
translation.zh: 如果你不具备这些 那所有的一切

translation.en: looks like a waste of time.
translation.zh: 看起来就是在浪费时间

translation.en: [man] That's it. Hold it.
translation.zh: 就是这样 保持

translation.en: That's it. Just hold it.
translation.zh: 很好 保持住

translation.en: [man 2] Looks a little different than two months ago, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 看起来跟两个月前稍微有些不一样了

translation.en: [Arnold] I never really was satisfied with my body.
translation.zh: 我对我的身体从来没有满意过

translation.en: God almighty.
translation.zh: 老天爷啊

translation.en: I looked in the mirror and said to myself, "I don't know how this shit body
translation.zh: 我看着镜子说： “我不知道这种破烂身体

translation.en: can ever win this competition."
translation.zh: 怎么可能赢得这场比赛”

translation.en: -Thanks for coming in. -Lou Ferrigno is coming too.
translation.zh: -谢谢你们过来 -卢·费里诺也会过来

translation.en: [Arnold] When I brag about myself, that's all bullshit.
translation.zh: 当我吹嘘自己时 那都是在胡扯

translation.en: -All right. -Very dramatic, Arnold.
translation.zh: 很好 叹为观止

translation.en: [Arnold] This is kind of like the other me, the me that I want the world to see.
translation.zh: 但这算是我的另一面 我希望展示给外界的那一面

translation.en: Take this one.
translation.zh: 看这个

translation.en: That should inspire you, because this is an arm shot.
translation.zh: 这应该能给你些灵感 因为这是手臂子弹肌

translation.en: It's Columbu.
translation.zh: 是哥伦布

translation.en: How do you like that shot?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: [Arnold] But in reality, when I'm by myself,
translation.zh: 但现实中 当我独处时

translation.en: I look at it and I say to myself,
translation.zh: 我会看着它们跟自己说：

translation.en: "It's not there yet. It's not happening."
translation.zh: “它们还没出来呢 什么都没有”

translation.en: Check the chest.
translation.zh: 看看胸肌

translation.en: [Arnold] I think it's the very thing that made me always be on the edge
translation.zh: 我觉得这正是让我一直坐立难安

translation.en: and always want more.
translation.zh: 总想追逐更多的原因

translation.en: Your chest looks tremendous, Arnold.
translation.zh: 你的胸肌好大啊 阿诺

translation.en: Huge.
translation.zh: 超大

translation.en: I was in Baltimore and Philadelphia
translation.zh: 我当时在巴尔的摩和费城

translation.en: doing, uh, posing exhibitions.
translation.zh: 做健美肌肉展示

translation.en: I came home,
translation.zh: 我回到家

translation.en: and, uh, Franco said to me… He says, you know, "I have bad news."
translation.zh: 弗朗哥跟我说… 他说：“我有一个坏消息”

translation.en: I said, "What's that?"
translation.zh: 我说：“是什么？”

translation.en: He said to me… he says, "Your brother died in a car accident."
translation.zh: 他告诉我： “你哥哥出车祸去世了

translation.en: "He was drunk driving,
translation.zh: 他当时是醉驾

translation.en: and that he was hitting a telephone pole."
translation.zh: 然后撞上了一根电杆”

translation.en: And I was, like, stunned.
translation.zh: 我当时呆住了

translation.en: [Arnold] He was always the darling of the family.
translation.zh: 他一直都是家里最受宠的那个

translation.en: He was very artistic.
translation.zh: 他非常有艺术细胞

translation.en: Very smart.
translation.zh: 非常聪明

translation.en: Read a lot.
translation.zh: 读了很多书

translation.en: But I don't think my brother ever was really happy.
translation.zh: 但我不认为我哥哥真正开心过

translation.en: I think he started drinking because our upbringing was very tough.
translation.zh: 我认为他会开始喝酒 是因为我们的成长经历非常艰难

translation.en: The brutality that was at home,
translation.zh: 家里充斥着暴力

translation.en: the beatings that we got from our parents sometimes,
translation.zh: 父母有时候会打我们

translation.en: all of this, I think he could not sustain,
translation.zh: 所有这些 我想他已经无法再承受了

translation.en: that punishment.
translation.zh: 惩罚

translation.en: He was much more delicate of a person
translation.zh: 他天生就是一个

translation.en: by nature.
translation.zh: 很细腻的人

translation.en: We had a very, kind of, schizophrenic behavior
translation.zh: 我和我哥哥在家里目睹过一种

translation.en: that my brother and I witnessed at home.
translation.zh: 算是非常精神分裂的行为

translation.en: There was the kind father,
translation.zh: 他有时候是慈父

translation.en: and then there was the other times where my father would come home drunk.
translation.zh: 有时候父亲会喝得醉醺醺地回家

translation.en: And he would scream at three in the morning.
translation.zh: 他会在凌晨三点钟大喊大叫

translation.en: We would wake up,
translation.zh: 我们会被吵醒

translation.en: and, all of a sudden, you know, our hearts were pounding,
translation.zh: 然后突然之间 我们心跳加速

translation.en: because we knew what that meant.
translation.zh: 因为我们知道那意味着什么

translation.en: That he could, at any given time, strike my mother
translation.zh: 他随时都可能会袭击我的母亲

translation.en: or go crazy.
translation.zh: 或者发狂

translation.en: So there was this kind of strange violence.
translation.zh: 所以家里一直存在着这种奇怪的暴力

translation.en: The kind of upbringing that we had
translation.zh: 我们这样的成长经历

translation.en: was beneficial for someone like me,
translation.zh: 对我这种内心非常强大

translation.en: who was, inside, very strong and very determined.
translation.zh: 意志非常坚定的人来说是十分有益的

translation.en: But my brother was more fragile.
translation.zh: 但我哥哥比较脆弱

translation.en: Nietzsche was right,
translation.zh: 尼采说得对

translation.en: that that what does not kill you, will make you stronger.
translation.zh: 那些摧毁不了你的东西 只会让你变得更强大

translation.en: The very thing that made me who I am today
translation.zh: 成就今天的我的东西

translation.en: was the very thing that destroyed him.
translation.zh: 正是摧毁他的东西

translation.en: [Arnold] In 1972, when I was competing in Essen, in Germany,
translation.zh: 1972年 我在德国埃森市比赛时

translation.en: my parents came for really
translation.zh: 我父母来了 至于原因

translation.en: unexplained reasons.
translation.zh: 我真的说不清楚

translation.en: I competed at least 50 times
translation.zh: 我参加过至少50场比赛

translation.en: in weightlifting competitions, in powerlifting competitions,
translation.zh: 有举重比赛 有力量举重比赛

translation.en: in locals and in statewide competitions,
translation.zh: 有当地比赛 有全州比赛

translation.en: national competitions.
translation.zh: 有全国比赛

translation.en: My parents never came to any of it.
translation.zh: 我父母从没去看过任何一场

translation.en: So that's why I was quite surprised.
translation.zh: 所以我非常诧异

translation.en: My father acted a little odd.
translation.zh: 我父亲的行为有一点奇怪

translation.en: He was a little slower. He was sometimes slurring things.
translation.zh: 他的动作有些迟缓 他说话有时会含糊不清

translation.en: And so there was something off a little bit there.
translation.zh: 所以情况有些不太对劲

translation.en: A few weeks later,
translation.zh: 几个星期后

translation.en: I got a phone call
translation.zh: 我接到一个电话

translation.en: that my father had a stroke.
translation.zh: 我父亲中风了

translation.en: I, uh, then took the next flight to Austria
translation.zh: 我搭了最近一班飞机回到奥地利

translation.en: and then went to visit my father in the hospital.
translation.zh: 然后去医院看我爸爸

translation.en: He was not able to communicate.
translation.zh: 他已经无法与人交流了

translation.en: You know, he needed a lot of medical attention,
translation.zh: 他需要许多医疗护理

translation.en: but I did not know is this something you can overcome or not.
translation.zh: 但我不知道有没有可能战胜这种情况

translation.en: That I did not know.
translation.zh: 我并不清楚

translation.en: I flew back to Los Angeles,
translation.zh: 我飞回了洛杉矶

translation.en: and then after that, he passed away.
translation.zh: 后来 他过世了

translation.en: [Arnold] When my father and my brother died,
translation.zh: 我父亲和哥哥过世时

translation.en: I had no feelings about it.
translation.zh: 我的内心毫无波澜

translation.en: You know? I eliminated it.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我把感受都删除了

translation.en: It maybe comes out sometimes in my life later on…
translation.zh: 在我往后的人生中 它们也许会浮现出来…

translation.en: those feelings, you know, but I don't know.
translation.zh: 那些情感…我不知道

translation.en: I've been training myself to do that.
translation.zh: 我一直在训练自己这么做

translation.en: Not to be affected by anything else from the outside.
translation.zh: 不受外界的任何事情影响

translation.en: I mean,
translation.zh: 我的意思是

translation.en: I'm not an expert
translation.zh: 我不是什么

translation.en: in psychology or anything like that.
translation.zh: 心理学专家之类的

translation.en: All I can tell you is that
translation.zh: 我只能告诉你

translation.en: when you're a person that has always a goal,
translation.zh: 如果你是一个永远都目标明确的人

translation.en: that always has a mission,
translation.zh: 当你总是肩负着任务时

translation.en: the less time that you have to think about, "How do I feel today?"
translation.zh: 你就越少会去思考 “我今天是什么心情？

translation.en: "Am I depressed today?"
translation.zh: 我今天沮丧吗？

translation.en: "Do I feel sorry for myself?"
translation.zh: 我为自己感到难过吗？

translation.en: "Have I become a victim?"
translation.zh: 我变成受害者了吗？

translation.en: "Oh my God. I feel so bad about myself," and all this.
translation.zh: 天啊 我觉得自己好糟糕” 诸如此类

translation.en: I don't have time for this crap. A lot of times, it's people didn't work enough.
translation.zh: 我没时间浪费在这种破事上 会这样做的 通常都是不够努力的人

translation.en: If you're busy all the time,
translation.zh: 如果你一直都很忙碌

translation.en: you don't have time to think about this stuff.
translation.zh: 你就没时间胡思乱想了

translation.en: Let's just move forward. Move. Move. Move. Move.
translation.zh: 我们继续前进吧 快走

translation.en: [Arnold] When I realized that bodybuilding is not established,
translation.zh: 当我意识到健美运动并非主流时

translation.en: I decided that I'm gonna promote the hell out of myself.
translation.zh: 我决定要努力提升自己

translation.en: [man] What are the judges looking for?
translation.zh: 评委们追求的是什么？

translation.en: [Arnold] Well, they're looking for proportions, symmetry, the size of the muscles,
translation.zh: 他们追求的是比例 对称性 肌肉大小

translation.en: how you can pose and present the muscles.
translation.zh: 展示姿势 展示肌肉的方式

translation.en: I want to put some effort out to help people understand
translation.zh: 我想贡献一份力量 帮人们理解

translation.en: what the sport is all about.
translation.zh: 这是一项怎样的运动

translation.en: -[man] Got everything in the chair now? -No, there was a problem.
translation.zh: -现在你整个人都坐上椅子了吗？ -不是 有点问题

translation.en: -I see. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh: 这样啊

translation.en: [Arnold] I've only been in this country five years.
translation.zh: 我来到这个国家才五年

translation.en: What does it mean, "hanky-panky?"
translation.zh: “巫山云雨”是什么意思？

translation.en: -My goodness. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: ♪ I wonder, wonder… ♪
translation.zh: （他不是傻大个 兼具头脑与肌肉）

translation.en: [Arnold] It's a sport. I'm competing to be the best in it.
translation.zh: 它是一项运动 我力求成为最优秀的选手

translation.en: And I feel that, at the same time, I'm an artist.
translation.zh: 我觉得 我同时也是一名艺术家

translation.en: I'm creating a body that wasn't there before.
translation.zh: 我正在打造一具前所未有的身体

translation.en: [Albert] In '74, Arnold was in fantastic shape,
translation.zh: 1974年 阿诺的身体状态堪称完美

translation.en: and he was absolutely unbeatable.
translation.zh: 他绝对无人能敌

translation.en: [Arnold] In 1974, I won the Mr. Olympia competition.
translation.zh: 1974年 我赢得了 “奥林匹亚先生”大赛

translation.en: So I won, all together, 13 world bodybuilding championships,
translation.zh: 所以我一共赢得了13次世界健美冠军

translation.en: one after the next…
translation.zh: 一个接一个

translation.en: because I was driven by this vision.
translation.zh: 因为我受这种愿景所驱使

translation.en: What else was there to do?
translation.zh: 还有什么能做的？

translation.en: To win another one?
translation.zh: 再赢一场比赛？

translation.en: Boring.
translation.zh: 无聊

translation.en: So I stopped.
translation.zh: 于是我停了下来

translation.en: I mean, I'm competing now for 10 years.
translation.zh: 我已经参加了十年的比赛

translation.en: And after 10 years, I feel like it's enough, you know?
translation.zh: 十年后 我觉得够了 你明白吗？

translation.en: You have to let other people have a chance
translation.zh: 我得把机会留给其他人了

translation.en: and, uh, just leave as a winner.
translation.zh: 就这样以胜利者的姿态离开

translation.en: [announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, Arnold Schwarzenegger!
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 阿诺·施瓦辛格！

translation.en: [Arnold] It's a sport and I love to compete.
translation.zh: 这是一项运动 我喜欢竞争

translation.en: And, uh, I love to be the best in the world.
translation.zh: 我喜欢成为世界一流

translation.en: You know, just the best.
translation.zh: 你知道的 独领风骚

translation.en: To stand up there and know that there is no other man
translation.zh: 站在台上 心里知道没有其他人

translation.en: better in this particular field than I am.
translation.zh: 在这个领域能够超越我

translation.en: And, um, so I think it's such a repetitious thing now,
translation.zh: 现在我觉得这是一件不断重复的事情

translation.en: that I would like to go on to another thing,
translation.zh: 我想继续向别的事情进发

translation.en: and, uh, you know, try to be the best in something else.
translation.zh: 努力成为另一领域的佼佼者

translation.en: [man] Like what?
translation.zh: 比如什么？

translation.en: I would like to get into acting.
translation.zh: 我想从事演艺事业

translation.en: Find out if I can be good in that.
translation.zh: 看看我在这个领域能不能大放光彩

translation.en: [man] I remember being on the phone.
translation.zh: 我记得我当时跟他通电话

translation.en: [Arnold] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [man] I said…
translation.zh: 我说…

translation.en: Tell me about your process as an actor.
translation.zh: 跟我说说你作为演员的进程吧

translation.en: He said, "Jim."
translation.zh: 他说：“吉姆

translation.en: "I don't want to be an actor."
translation.zh: 我不想当演员

translation.en: "I want to be a star."
translation.zh: 我想成为一个明星”
